C. C) Vishal-Shekhar

Options:
A. Bohemia
B. Eminem
C. Drake
D. Lil Wayne

Which song is present in the same album as 'Chandni Chowk to China'?
Options:
A. A) Bohemia
B. B) India Se Aaya Tera Dost (Aap Ki Khatir)
C. C) Chandni Chowk to China (CC2C)

Correct Answer: B) India Se Aaya Tera Dost (Aap Ki Khatir)
